Question.Subject: I need suggestions for San Francisco restaurants with good food and good catering service.?
Question.Content: I need suggestions on restaurants in San Francisco with good food and good catering service. I have two upcoming events one is for 200 and another is for 21. American Food, Soul Food, Mexican, Italian, and Chinese are the options.

ChosenAnswer:
Here is a great list of different restaurants in San Francisco
http://sanfranguide.com/restaurants/

Answers.Answer: well since i dont know your budget, i recommend Hakka Restaurant for chinese food its cheap and its good! prime ribs have very good food but its super expensive try yelp.com
